segments.text: The woman is so calm, like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is everywhere, but she’s just drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so bold, taking cookies right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach that jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is getting deeper, but no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely missing the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on those cookies, nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll get away with it or if the woman will finally notice.
segments.speaker: PAR
